subject: Exception handling in running thread test cases
msgSnippet: I want to know how JUnit framework will handle exceptions when a test case is a Thread, and running a bunch of test cases, one test case throws exception or
messageBody:
I want to know how JUnit framework will handle exceptions when a test
case is a Thread, and running a bunch of test cases, one test case
throws exception or hung, will the remaining test cases in the Suite
will be executed ???
Thanks
